title: Implement Token-based Voting Governance
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
1. First, implement a token that can be voted on.
2. Implement fund management of Bank through DAO:
    * The Bank contract has a method to withdraw funds (withdraw()), which can only be called by the administrator.
    * The governance contract (Gov) acts as the administrator of the Bank, and the Gov contract uses token voting to execute corresponding actions.
    * Manage the funds of Bank by initiating proposals from the Bank contract funds.

In addition to the contract code, complete proposals, voting, and execution test cases are required.
Please paste your GitHub link.

description: Master how to implement a token that can be voted on, and understand how to implement the three stages of proposal, voting, and execution based on governance.
